pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadanti pariyāyena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.2_1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato cūḷapanthakassa pariyāyo hoti bhikkhuniyo ovadituṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.3_0: Bhikkhuniyo evamāhaṁsu—“na dāni ajja ovādo iddho bhavissati,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.3_1: taññeva dāni udānaṁ ayyo cūḷapanthako punappunaṁ bhaṇissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.4_0: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo yenāyasmā cūḷapanthako tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.4_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ cūḷapanthakaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.5_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho tā bhikkhuniyo āyasmā cūḷapanthako etadavoca—“samaggāttha, bhaginiyo”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.9_1: ovādo”ti niyyādetvā imaṁ udānaṁ punappunaṁ abhāsi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.14_0: Bhikkhuniyo evamāhaṁsu—“nanu avocumhā—na dāni ajja ovādo iddho bhavissati,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.14_1: taññeva dāni udānaṁ ayyo cūḷapanthako punappunaṁ bhaṇissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.15_0: Assosi kho āyasmā cūḷapanthako tāsaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ imaṁ kathāsallāpaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.16_0: Atha kho āyasmā cūḷapanthako vehāsaṁ abbhuggantvā ākāse antalikkhe caṅkamatipi tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi seyyampi kappeti dhūmāyatipi pajjalatipi antaradhāyatipi,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.16_1: tañceva udānaṁ bhaṇati aññañca bahuṁ buddhavacanaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.19_0: Na vata no ito pubbe ovādo evaṁ iddho bhūtapubbo yathā ayyassa cūḷapanthakassā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.20_0: Atha kho āyasmā cūḷapanthako tā bhikkhuniyo yāva samandhakārā ovaditvā uyyojesi—“gacchatha, bhaginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.21_0: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo nagaradvāre thakite bahinagare vasitvā kālasseva nagaraṁ pavisanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.22_0: Manussā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—“abrahmacāriniyo imā bhikkhuniyo;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.23_0: ārāme bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ vasitvā idāni nagaraṁ pavisantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.24_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.25_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.26_0: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā cūḷapanthako atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:1.33.1_0: “Sammatopi ce bhikkhu atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc22:2.1.8_0: aṭṭhahi vā garudhammehi aññena vā dhammena ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
